<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Master of Many Styles](/Feats.aspx?ID=4850) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 150 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 165 <sup>4.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 126 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[[Fighter](/Classes.aspx?ID=35)] [Opening Stance (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4845); [[Monk](/Classes.aspx?ID=60)] [Reflexive Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6030)

**Trigger**
Your turn begins

</column>

---

You move fluidly between stances, using your mastery of combat to always adopt the best tactics. You use an action with the stance trait.

<title level="2">Master of Many Styles leads to...</title>
[Immortal Techniques](/Feats.aspx?ID=6050), [Qi Center](/Feats.aspx?ID=6045)
name: Master of Many Styles
